name: Llanhafrwdhe
culture_notes: Coastal Tongues dialect with Riveric loanwords
tide-blessing festivals tied to fishing calendar
diet heavy on salted fish, kelp and preserved shellfish
stilted wooden houses and rock jetties
constraints: ritual magic consumes scarce imported reagents
long-range mind influence is banned locally
navigational auguries supplement but don't replace charts
notes: near-medieval tech with localized ritual magic
shallow harbor limits large ships; local pilots prized
